DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation efficacy safety etanercept ( Enbrel ) patient active , severe advance ankylose spondylitis .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Etanercept Treatment Active , Severe , Advanced Axial Ankylosing Spondylitis
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Active severe ankylose spondylitis Ankylosing spondylitis refractory standard antirheumatic treatment Between 18 70 year age Exclusion criterion Prior exposure TNFinhibitor , include etanercept DMARDs ( hydroxychloroquine , methotrexate sulphasalazine ) within 4 week study drug initiation Dose NSAIDs change within two week study drug initiation
